headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Preparing for our digital death
text: On the show this week Aleks Krotoski explores the idea of digital death ahead of the Digital Death Day symposium taking place in London on 6 October. Aleks is joined by co-organisoer Andriana Cassimatis and the developer of the Legacy app, Victoria Moore, to discuss why we need to consider what happens to our growing digital assets when we die. Aleks is joined by Guardian technology editor Charles Arthur to discuss new fines for those who send spam texts and the latest results from BlackBerry maker RIM.
